{"id":1521688237,"question_id":3427,"lang":"cpp","lang_name":"C++","time":"1 week, 4 days","timestamp":1737949254,"status":10,"status_display":"Accepted","runtime":"3 ms","url":"/submissions/detail/1521688237/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Special Array II","memory":"126.7 MB","code":"class Solution {\npublic:\n    vector<bool> isArraySpecial(vector<int>& nums, vector<vector<int>>& queries) {\n        //queries[i] = [fromi, toi]\n        vector<int> prefix(nums.size(), 0); //total number of violative indices up to index i in nums for all indices i\n        prefix[0] = 0; //\n        for(int i=1; i<nums.size(); i++) {\n            if(nums[i]%2 == nums[i-1]%2)\n                prefix[i] = prefix[i-1]+1;\n            else\n                prefix[i]=prefix[i-1];\n        }\n            \n        vector<bool> rets(queries.size(), false);\n        for(int i=0; i<queries.size(); i++) {\n            int start = queries[i][0];\n            int end = queries[i][1];\n            rets[i] = (prefix[end] - prefix[start])==0;\n        }\n        return rets;\n\n    }\n};","compare_result":"","title_slug":"special-array-ii","has_notes":false,"flag_type":1}
